gabriel.components
Class AccessManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  gabriel.components.AccessManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccessManager
public class AccessManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccessManager

AccessManager checks for access rights with permissions. Simple implementation of AccessManager. This implementation uses ACL lists with entries to manage mappings from principals to permissions.

Version:
$Id: AccessManagerImpl.html,v 1.1.1.1 2004-06-16 07:56:34 stephan Exp $
Author:
Stephan J. Schmidt
